mapper.select:
select r.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from product b) a
where rownum <= #{page}*8)r
where r.rn > (#{page}-1) *8 and category_no IN (select category_no from category where category_no_ref = #{categoryNo})
select count(*) from product where category_no IN (select category_no from category where category_no_ref = #{categoryNo})

select * from category where category_no_ref In (select category_no_ref from category where category_no = #{categoryNo}) or category_no IN (select category_no_ref from category where category_no = #{categoryNo})

select case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then 'main' else '' end as "cate_col1", case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then category_name else '' end as "cate_col2", case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then '' else 'sub' end as "cate_col3", case when nvl(category_no_ref, 0) = 0 then '' else category_name end as "cate_col4", category_no from category c start with category_no_ref is null connect by category_no_ref = prior category_no order siblings by category_no

select r.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from product b) a
where rownum <= #{page}*6)r
where r.rn > (#{page}-1) *6 and product_name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from product where product_name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%'
